title: HOP ON THE TRAIN
description: Processed archives from Montreux Jazz Memories and designed an interactive exhibition to explore the collection and synthesize new stories.

title: Living in a Material(istic) World
description: Analyzed over five decades of Billboard Hot 100 lyrics to examine the relationship between popular music and evolving materialistic practices.

title: Spatialising Barclay Johnson's Travelogue
description: Created a data pipeline extracting people, locations, and interactions from an 1858 travelogue, mapping the journey to visualize it on a map.

title: Claude Nobs' Experience
description: Designed an immersive panoramic experience allowing visitors to virtually explore Claude Nobs' chalet in Montreux.

title: Lume
description: Designed a gamified service to incentivize and reward reduced energy consumption among students in flatshares.

title: Festivize
description: Researched, validated, and designed a platform to streamline the organization and management of festivals and events.

title: Tal√¨a
description: Leveraging guerrilla marketing practices to value urban heritage and local creative communities in Sicily.

title: Maestro
description: Designed a rhythmic party game where players alternate between conducting and performing to guess words through musical cues.
